content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position x1)
- Inserter (position y1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position z) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position x1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory to craft the desired items. For example, crafting an Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when trying to craft without the necessary machines
- Verify that the required crafting machine or furnace is available for the recipe you are trying to use.
